Standard Technical Specifications (R2AT Hoses)

Nominal Size (DN) Internal Diameter Outer Diameter Working Pressure (BAR) Burst Pressure (BAR) Bend Radius (MM)

DN10 3/8" (9.5mm) 19.0mm 330 1320 130

*All specifications meet or exceed RAC ITALY and international standards. Custom sizes available on request.
